function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of active travel and physical activity leading to increased risk of obesity and chronic diseases","Impact":"Increased mortality risk in COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Promotion and facilitation of active travel and physical activity through infrastructure and policy interventions","Technologies":"Urban planning technologies for improved walkability and active travel infrastructure","People":"Individuals at risk of obesity and chronic diseases, especially those susceptible to COVID-19","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased risk of infectious diseases in built environments with low walkability and active travel infrastructure","Impact":"Greater susceptibility to outbreaks of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved walkability, promotion of active travel, and development of effective public health measures","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and improving built environments","People":"Residents and occupants of built environments with low walkability","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction in physical activity due to limitations on access to destinations","Impact":"Increased morbidity and risk of mortality from chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Ensuring access to destinations such as parks, home, and recreational facilities through community planning and infrastructure development","Technologies":"Community planning tools for equitable access to destinations","People":"Communities and individuals with limited access to destinations for physical activity","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, urban planners"}]}
